Spodziewałem się lepszej wersji pierwszej części. Trochę się zawiodłem ale nadal gra bardzo dobra.
  Jeśli mam być szczery to muszę powiedzieć, że MOCNO WIDAĆ w jaką stronę valve poszło jeśli chodzi o portal 2. Zamiast prostej choć wymagającej, gry logicznej poszli w szaloną fabułę i skupili się na co-op. Wyszedł sam w sobie bardzo dobrze, lecz wolałbym więcej portala w portal 2 a nie co-op. Gra 7/10

Probably the best co-op game in the market. Level design is top notch, story was a nice bonus. We finished this game in one sitting (about 6hrs), and can't help but wanting more levels. Workshop is also brilliant, there're many hidden gems. 
Granted this game require some skills, basic knowledge of how physics works :) at least one of you need to know what's going on. It's also great fun playing with newbies, nice opportunity to practice your communication skills XD. 
This game definitely worth every penny. It might be a long shot but I hope one day valve will release Portal 3. I'll be waiting! 
*warning: it's normal if you feel nauseous in some level, especially with the gravity well. Take a break, don't push too hard.
Continuing from where the first Portal game left off, continue to find more about the Aperture Labs history.

The visuals are average to sub-par compared to new rtx games, but like it was made 9 years ago and it's not uncomfortable to look at at all. Buy it now. It will not be a waste of money.

Have heard about this game for years and never sat down to play it. Finally in 2021 I've completed the game and have to say I had an absolute blast. Pairs perfectly with your favorite beer or cocktail. Genius level and puzzle design, witty commentary, and just plain fun. I have not played any other game like it, and was sad that I finished the game so quickly! The comments are valid: Just BUY IT!
comedic narration, but requires a more specific taste.
